EmailTemplate.name: 2019BK-10 BendixKing Over The Counter (OTC) Equipment Sales EXTERNAL.2019BK-10 B
EmailTemplate.subject: 2019 BendixKing Sales Bulletin Updates and Discounts
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | October 2019
Thank you for being a valued customer. Here are this week's sales bulletins:
Over The Counter (OTC) Equipment Sales BendixKing is pleased to provide an update to our OTC sales policy, with Dealer Bulletin 2019BK-10 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019BK-10 BendixKing Over The Counter %28OTC%29 Equipment Sales.pdf]]>.
AeroCruze 230 Autopilot BendixKing is excited to announce pricing and ordering guidance for the AeroCruze 230 (KFC 230) flight control system, with Operator Bulletin 2019BK_O_07 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019BK_O_07 AeroCruze 230 Autopilot.pdf]]>.
The complete list of 2019 sales bulletins is available at aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/downloads/sales-bulletins <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/downloads/sales-bulletins]]>. Dealers must log in to view these bulletins.
Find your nearest BendixKing Area Sales Manager by visiting our website: https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]>.
Click here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
